about_the_game:
Forget standard puzzles!

Machinery 3 is your personal engineering playground where creativity knows no bounds.
Each challenge is a blank canvas for your engineering genius.
Create unique mechanisms that not only work but also inspire awe.
From simple machines to complex mechanisms, the only limit is your imagination. What amazing inventions will you create?

Machinery 3 comes equipped with a powerful set of tools:

Mutable blocks:

Connectors:

Motors:

Jet engines:

Combine them, experiment with shapes, and build incredible constructions.
The game offers two viewing modes: 2D and 3D, with a consistent side-view perspective.
Save your assembled mechanisms to use them in other levels or simply enjoy watching your creations come to life.
With motors and jet engines at your disposal, it's easy to create moving and flying machines.
The intuitive interface for configuring motor and jet engine controls enhances gameplay in the physics simulation mode.

Level Editor:

Machinery 3 gives you the same tools as the game developers.
Design your own levels with the powerful and easy-to-use built-in editor.
Share your creations with other players through Steam® Workshop—with just one click, you can showcase your inventions to the world and draw inspiration from other players' ideas.

Key features:

  • Extensive and powerful editor for creating your own levels

  • Mechanism for configuring motor and jet engine controls

  • No limits on the number of elements and mechanisms used

  • Ability to change the shape of basic elements and connect them in constructions using rigid or rotating joints

  • Ability to save constructions and use them in other levels; Steam® Workshop access for a potentially unlimited supply of levels

name: Machinery 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 615 (OpenGL 2.1 compatible)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Aspect Ratio 16:9. The indicated requirements are the lowest we have tested with but the app may run on less powerful hardware.

short_description: Develop your engineering skills in an engaging way! By solving a variety of puzzles, you will learn to create complex mechanisms and understand the principles behind their operation. Each level is a new lesson that will help you become a true master of engineering.
